org.apache.pdfbox.util

Class BitFlagHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pdfbox.util.BitFlagHelper

  • public class BitFlagHelper
extends Object
    This class will be used for bit flag operations.

    $Revision: 1.4 $

           String field,
           int bitFlag,
           boolean value)
        Deprecated. use setFlag(COSDictionary, COSName, int, boolean) using COSName constants instead
        Sets the given boolean value at bitPos in the flags.
        Parameters:
        dic - The dictionary to set the value into.
        field - The name of the field to set the value into.
        bitFlag - the bit position to set the value in.
        value - the value the bit position should have.

      • getFlag

        public static final boolean getFlag(COSDictionary dic,
              String field,
              int bitFlag)
        Deprecated. use #getFlag(COSDictionary, COSName, boolean) using COSName constants instead
        Gets the boolean value from the flags at the given bit position.
        Parameters:
        dic - The dictionary to get the field from.
        field - The name of the field to get the flag from.
        bitFlag - the bitPosition to get the value from.
        Returns:
        true if the number at bitPos is '1'
